participant_1.background:
I've never been arrested, but I did meet one of my favorite celebrities and get his autograph when I was growing up in New Hampshire.
I'm not rich, but I'm working hard to provide for my family.
i am a fruitarian.
sometimes i wish my computer would work faster.
I am a busy student who walks for exercise to de-stress after my kids go to bed.

participant_2.background:
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.
I took my camera with me to take photos of the beautiful scenery and interesting people I met.
i am a grandparent at 44.
i have perfect pitch.
I have a dog named Buddy who is my best friend and always accompanies me on my mountain bike rides.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go on mountain bike rides with my dog Buddy.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been mountain biking before.
You should give it a try! It's a great way to get exercise and see some beautiful scenery.
Maybe I will! I'm always looking for new ways to stay active.
I also love to take photos. I have a perfect pitch, so I love taking pictures of the beautiful scenery and interesting people I meet on my travels.
That's a great skill to have! I'm not very good at taking photos.
You should practice more! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories. I love the way they get me in the mood for the season.
That sounds like a great book! I love spooky stories too.
I'm glad! What's your favorite spooky story?
I don't know if I could pick just one favorite spooky story. I love them all!
Me too! They're so much fun to read.
I agree! They're the perfect way to get in the Halloween spirit.
